metadata.name: Procdump Execution
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the SysInternals Procdump utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\procdump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\procdump64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of the SysInternals Procdump utility

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of procdump by a developer or administrator Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/procdump
